attributes.action: encourage the Archbishop of Canterbury to reisn after the comments he made about Sharia law
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The prime minister, Gordon Brown, should encourage or force the archbishop of Canterbury to resign from his position after the awful comments he made about sharia law in the UK. Not only contradicting what he stands for but the whole Anglican church and the queen of england.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
